unnormalised: I remember feeling so lost after my grandmother passed away in Kolkata. My friend, Priya, recommended a mental health app. At first, I was skeptical, but honestly, it helped me process my grief. It wasn't like Kuch Kuch Hota Hai, a magical fix! But journaling through it, and the guided meditations were quite useful during that difficult time, especially the ones referencing the practices at the NIMHANS. Definitely worth a try, folks!
